## Add file selector button
```{r}
library(shiny)
#library(NaiveBayesGaussianR6)

ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Select a file"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput("option", "Choose an option:",
                  choices = c(".csv", ".xlsx", ".txt")
                  ),
      fileInput("file1", "Choose File",
                accept = c(".csv")
                ),
      #textInput('Number of Rows'),
      actionButton("show", "Show first 5 rows"),
      #actionButton("", "Show first 5 rows")
      ),
    
    mainPanel(
      tableOutput("contents")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  data <- reactive({
    req(input$file1)
    read.csv(input$file1$datapath, header = TRUE)
  })

  output$contents <- renderTable({
    if(input$show == 0) {
      return(NULL)
    } else {
      head(data(), 5)
    }
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
